title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using a valid email and password, including validation of required fields and password strength.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address
Input a strong password meeting all complexity requirements
Submit the registration form
Verify that registration is successful and user is redirected to onboarding flow

title: User Registration Fails With Invalid Email
description: Verify that registration fails when the email format is invalid and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input an invalid email format (e.g., 'useratexample')
Input a valid password
Submit the registration form
Verify an error message indicating invalid email format is shown and registration is prevented

title: User Login Success with Email/Password
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Verify user is logged in and redirected to the dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login fails if the user enters a valid email but incorrect password, with appropriate error feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify login is rejected and an error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: Social OAuth Login with Google
description: Verify user registration and login flow using Google OAuth provider, including first-time registration and returning users.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on 'Sign in with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth consent flow
Verify user is logged in and directed to onboarding if new user

title: Multi-step Onboarding Flow Progress Tracking
description: Validate that onboarding progress is tracked accurately and users are redirected to incomplete steps after login if onboarding is not completed.

steps.description: Register a new user and start onboarding
Complete only some steps of the onboarding flow
Logout and login again
Verify the user is redirected to the remaining onboarding step(s)

title: Create New Team and Add Members with Role Assignment
description: Verify users can create a team, invite members via email, assign roles with RBAC permissions, and members can accept invitations successfully.

steps.description: Login as user with permission to create teams
Create a new team with a unique name
Invite a new member by email
Assign a role with specific permissions to the invited member
Have invited user accept the invitation
Verify member is added to the team with assigned role and permissions enforced

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement on Team Actions
description: Verify that users cannot perform team management actions (e.g., adding members, deleting documents) if their RBAC role lacks the required permissions.

steps.description: Login as a team member with limited role permissions
Attempt to perform an action restricted by role, such as removing another member
Verify the action is blocked and an 'access denied' message is shown

title: Upload Document and Vector Index for RAG Chatbot
description: Test uploading a supported document type, verify document chunking and vector embeddings generation, and confirm documents can be retrieved via RAG chatbot queries.

steps.description: Login and navigate to document upload interface
Upload a supported document (e.g., PDF or DOCX)
Verify document is chunked and vector embeddings are created and persisted
Use the RAG chatbot to query the uploaded document content
Verify the chatbot provides accurate and contextually relevant responses derived from the uploaded document

title: AI Pre-Check Document Validation
description: Validate that the AI pre-check system correctly validates documents against predefined business rules and returns clear feedback for user corrections.

steps.description: Upload a document that violates business rules (e.g., missing required fields)
Trigger AI Pre-Check validation
Verify system returns detailed validation errors and suggestions for fixing issues

title: AI Pre-Check Validation Success Path
description: Verify that documents conforming to business rules pass AI pre-check validation with confirmation messages.

steps.description: Upload a document that fully complies with business rules
Initiate AI Pre-Check validation
Verify validation passes with success confirmation and no errors

title: Receive AI-Powered CEO Digest Daily Report
description: Validate that subscribed business users receive accurate daily CEO digest summary reports via email and dashboard notification on schedule.

steps.description: Configure user subscription to CEO digest
Verify daily email with executive summary is sent at scheduled time
Verify CEO digest notification is visible in the user dashboard notification area
Verify digest content reflects accurate aggregated business data

title: Role-Based Data Isolation in Multi-Tenancy
description: Verify that users from one tenant cannot access data from other tenants and that row-level security policies and schema separation are enforced.

steps.description: Login as user belonging to Tenant A
Attempt to access data owned by Tenant B via API or UI
Verify access is denied and no unauthorized data is exposed
Validate database schema and row-level policies prevent cross-tenant data leakage

title: Subscription Management and Billing via Stripe Integration
description: Test subscribing to different tiers, upgrading/downgrading plans, viewing invoices, and handling payments through the Stripe customer portal.

steps.description: Login as a paying user
Navigate to billing settings and initiate subscription to a plan
Complete checkout using Stripe hosted checkout
Verify subscription is active and invoice is generated
Upgrade or downgrade subscription plan
Verify subscription changes are applied correctly with proration if applicable
Access Stripe customer portal and verify payment methods and invoices listed

title: Automated Dunning Management on Payment Failures
description: Verify that the system automatically detects payment failures, sends dunning emails in correct sequence, and softens user access after repeated unsuccessful payment attempts.

steps.description: Simulate payment failure for a subscribed user
Verify dunning email #1 is sent after initial failure
Simulate continued payment failures
Verify subsequent dunning emails are sent as per configured schedule
Verify user access is restricted or softened after multiple failed payment attempts

title: Audit Logs Capture All Critical Database Changes
description: Verify that all create, update, delete operations on critical data entities are logged with correct metadata including user, timestamp, and operation details.

steps.description: Perform create, update, and delete operations on documents and team settings
Verify audit logs contain accurate entries for each operation with correct user and timestamp

title: Privacy Layer PII Masking and GDPR Compliance
description: Verify that all personal identifiable information in documents and user data is masked according to privacy rules and that data export and deletion workflows comply with GDPR regulations.

steps.description: Upload document containing PII data
Verify that PII data is masked in UI and in API responses
Request data export for user account
Verify exported data includes all relevant user information as per GDPR
Initiate account deletion
Verify all user data is deleted or anonymized as per compliance rules

title: Real-Time In-App Notification Delivery and Display
description: Verify that relevant platform events trigger timely notifications that are displayed in-app without email fatigue, including team updates and billing alerts.

steps.description: Trigger platform event such as new team member added or billing alert
Verify real-time notification is pushed and displayed correctly in the user's notification center
Verify notification content is accurate, actionable, and does not generate redundant emails

title: White-label Branding Updates Reflect in UI and Emails
description: Verify tenant-specific branding customizations including UI themes, logos, and email templates are correctly applied and visible to users.

steps.description: As tenant admin, update branding settings with custom colors, logos, and email template
Verify that UI reflects updated branding immediately
Trigger a transactional email (e.g., invitation or digest)
Verify email uses the tenant's custom branding and SMTP settings

title: System Handles AI Service Downtime Gracefully
description: Confirm that when the integrated AI services (like Google Gemini AI) are unavailable, the system continues to serve core CRUD functionality without degradation or crashes.

steps.description: Simulate downtime of AI service endpoints
Attempt to use AI-powered features such as CEO digest generation or AI pre-check
Verify informative error messages are shown
Perform regular document CRUD operations during AI downtime
Verify core features operate normally without impact

title: Dashboard Real-Time Metrics and Activity Logs Display
description: Verify the dashboard loads and displays real-time metrics, charts, CEO digest, and activity logs accurately and responsively.

steps.description: Login to dashboard as user with access
Verify real-time metrics and charts load without errors
Verify activity logs show recent relevant events
Verify CEO digest summary is accessible via dashboard

title: Webhook Delivery with Signature Verification and Retry Logic
description: Verify the webhook system sends outgoing event notifications with correct signature headers, logs delivery attempts, and retries failed deliveries according to policy.

steps.description: Configure webhook endpoint URL and secret in tenant settings
Trigger events that generate webhook notifications
Verify webhook requests contain valid signature headers for verification
Simulate webhook endpoint failures (e.g., 500 HTTP response)
Verify retries are attempted as per configured retry logic
Verify delivery logs correctly capture success and failure attempts

title: Data Migration Engine for User Tier Upgrades
description: Validate that moving a user or tenant from a lower tier to a higher tier (shared to schema-based or isolated DB) via data migration engine completes without interruption of service or data loss.

steps.description: Select a user/tenant for tier upgrade
Initiate data migration to the target tier
Verify migration completes successfully without data inconsistency
Verify user services remain available during migration with no data loss

title: Admin Configure API Keys and Webhooks
description: Verify administrators can create, update, revoke API keys and configure webhook endpoints with correct permission enforcement and validation.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to API keys management
Create new API key and verify it is listed
Revoke an existing API key
Navigate to webhook settings and add a new webhook endpoint
Verify webhook configuration is saved and validated

title: Demo Mode Provides Functional Product Tour Without Persistence
description: Verify that activating the demo mode offers a fully functional product tour with realistic sample data, but no changes are persisted to the backend database.

steps.description: Activate demo mode from landing page
Verify the product tour is available and operational
Perform actions like document upload and AI chat in demo mode
Verify all actions behave as normal but no data is stored persistently
